page.title: 13'A Cut Above The Rest'.
page.content: In our D block there is 56% Rural and 44% Residential. We visited a hairdressing shop and interviewed the manager. On Fridays about 25 people come to the shop,roughly 15 women and 10 men. At the beginning of the week they get about 5 or 10. Between the age of 20 and 30 the most popular hairstyle is long and casual. Between the age of 30 and 50 the most popular hairstyle is short and curly. The most popular hairstyle over 50 is a curly perm. Perms are ranged from Â£15.50-Â£22.00, because they are charged by the curlers.It is not busier in the holidays because of holiday makers because it is an all round working position. In our area we have got approximately 25 hairdressing shops, 20 hotels and 15 restaurants.
